blockhelp-banner-addlayer: Add layer (requires pattern in left hand)
ingameerror-banner-copylayers: Not able to copy from banner because both have patterns or base colors don't match
ingameerror-banner-rename: Not able to rename banner because book or paper has no title
ClearRotationsXZ: Clear all rotations for X and Z axis
Command.GenerateTextures.Description: Generates textures for banner from textures defined in json attributes. Overlays colored cloth textures on top of grayscale texture and saves new textures to {0} folder
Command.GenerateTextures.Success: Textures were sucessfully generated for banner
Command.GenerateBannerMC.Success: Successfully parsed Minecraft syntax and generated vs banner
Command.GenerateBannerMC.Error.MCSyntax: Invalid syntax. Example: 'minecraft:white_banner{BlockEntityTag:{_PLACEHOLDER_}}'. Make sure it is valid Minecraft 1.13+ syntax and has nothing before `minecraft:` and after last '}' symbol
